TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit RootedPathValidator extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationValidatorBase

summary.span: 验证控制 tempFilesLocation 配置开关的使用的规则。

span.span: Validates the rules governing the use of the tempFilesLocation configuration switch.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将 `WebReference` 对象添加到 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]中的 Web 服务时，Web 服务发现过程将创建文件。When adding a `WebReference` object to a Web service in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)], files are created by the Web service discovery process. Web 服务客户端通过添加 `WebReference` 对象了解查找 Web 服务说明（WSDL）文档的位置。Web service clients learn where to find the Web service description (WSDL) document by adding a `WebReference` object. 然后，Web 服务客户端使用 `WriteAll` 方法将发现的文档保存到磁盘。The Web service clients then save the discovered documents to the disk by using the `WriteAll` method. 例如，发现的文档可能是 .xsd 架构文件或服务说明。For example, the discovered documents may be .xsd schema files or service descriptions. 在该过程结束时，客户端将删除这些文件。At the end of the process, the client deletes the files. 您可以使用 Machine.config 配置文件中指定的 `` 元素中的 `tempFilesLocation` 开关更改临时文件夹中文件的默认位置，如以下示例中所示。You can change the default location of the files in the temporary folder by using the `tempFilesLocation` switch in the `` element, specified in the Machine.config configuration file, as in the following example. ```xml ``` `tempFilesLocation` 的值必须是绝对路径。The value of `tempFilesLocation` must be an absolute path. 如果指定的路径不是绝对路径，则在引用配置节时，[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 会生成 异常。If the path specified is not absolute, the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] generates a exception when the configuration section is referenced. 此属性的值将被截断以删除前导空格和尾随空格。The value of the property is truncated to remove leading and trailing white spaces. 如果 `tempFilesLocation` 属性的值由空格组成，则将使用默认的% TMP% location 作为编译。If value of the `tempFilesLocation` property is composed of white space, the default %TMP% location is used for the compilation. 当未指定 `tempFilesLocation` 开关时，将发生相同的默认行为。The same default behavior occurs when no `tempFilesLocation` switch is specified. 不会检查路径是否存在。The does not check to see whether the path exists. 否则，将生成 。If it does not, a is generated. 如果% TMP% 路径不存在，则这与 `XmlSerializer` 的默认行为完全相同。This is identical to the default behavior of the `XmlSerializer` if the %TMP% path does not exist.

Public Overrides Sub Validate (value As Object)

summary.span: 确定对象的值是否有效。

span.span: Determines whether the value of an object is valid.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 要验证的 `XmlSerializer` 对象作为 `Validate` 方法的参数进行传递。The `XmlSerializer` object to validate is passed as a parameter of the `Validate` method.
